Module com.cafe.group5a2
Package com.cafe.group5a2

Class DriverController

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.group5a2.DriverController
public class DriverController extends Object
This controller represents a view for a driver after they have logged in on the system
Author:
Chris Griffiths, Cameron Turner, Adam Tucker

    • setDevTab

      public void setDevTab()
      Sets the DevOrdTab labels with orders if delivery is required. Once executed if there is a delivery waiting the text is set to the postcode of that delivery destination
